mapper.select: select c.id, c.customerid, c.numbers, p.image, p.name, p.content, p.price from carshop c left join product p on c.productid = p.id where c.customerid = #{customerid}
select * from carshop where customerid = #{customerid} and productid = #{pid}
mapper.update: update carshop set numbers = #{numbers} where productid = #{pid} and customerid = #{customerid}
